item.title: Sports Betting Links to Data and Stats
item.description: This post got decent traffic on the old blog. It’s the one article that made it to this new version. The title was “Sports Betting Data Downloads” (which wasn’t a good name in hindsight). A quarter of those links are dead, and there’s new material out there. Here’s an updated but pared down list. Data Pay For Data note: I don’t make a dime off recommending any of these
